mapper.select: select Message.messageID, Message.viewed, User.userID, User.username, User.image, Comment.content, Comment.commentTime, Comment.postID from Message, User, Comment where Message.receiverID = #{userID} and User.userID = Message.senderID and Message.type = 3 and Message.commentID = Comment.postCommentID and Comment.type = 2
mapper.insert: insert into Message (senderID, receiverID, viewed, content, type, sendTime, commentID) values (#{senderID}, #{receiverID}, #{viewed}, #{content}, #{type}, now(), #{commentID});
